title: Immortality
description: Veronica Stillman lives in a not too distant future where there is no separation between government and the corporate world. It is a future where the privileged can extend their lives by transplanting their thoughts and memories into androids. As Veronica becomes entangled with a seductive stranger, she ends up in a race to save her life before she becomes a victim of the growing political android movement.Note: This book is no longer available.
author: Vincent Pet
